channel.title: Need help with SpyderScape!
channel.description: Hello, I am using spyderscape, and i was wondering, does anyone know how to make it so Mods can do stuff. So far admins can do everything, of course, and mods can't do anything. All they got is a crown. I was wondering if it was possible to make mods be able to Kick, and Noclip. If it is respond here, if you dont know, please dont post.

item.title: Need help with SpyderScape!
item.dc:creator: @w4ffl3z w4ffl3z
item.description:
@w4ffl3z wrote:

For whatever command you want to use (noclip, kick) just find those commands in the source, and change the playerights. Something like this, else if (command.startsWith(“noclip”) && (playerRights >= 1)). You get the idea.

-w4ffl3z

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpyderScape!
item.dc:creator: @LJ999 LJ999
item.description:
@LJ999 wrote:

Yes i have that folder, i get the levels, but if i give them the number 1, it gives them Mod. So they log on, and yes they got Mod, but then they still can’t do anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with SpyderScape!
item.dc:creator: @kuiren2 Kuiren
item.description:
@kuiren2 wrote:

do u have the character folder with the character txts in the folder well if so then there will be character rights in the txts it should be the #s 123 3 is the highest

Read full topic
